title: I NEED HELP ON MY CLIENT PLZ SOMEONE!!!!!
body: I had to re-install league of legends patch 7.16 because it was not working, when i re-installed it the old L from the league of legends logo appears on my home screen icon instead of the curvy new L for the league of legends client logo. Before when i started league of legends it would take me directly to the login screen but now every time i try to run league it said The new client update has begun, but i already updated it and now i have to click launch in order to log in every time now and it is bothering me, any way i can change the old L and make it the new client L logo in my home screen and be able to go directly to the login screen and not need to press launch every time i am going to play league? please someone help me.

replies.body: It sounds like your settings are preventing the patcher from updating and launching properly.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform a repatch, and the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure League is added as an exception.  That should do it!

Okay so i downloaded it and did all that was requested in the permissions guide but it still isn't working, i forced a re-patch and a re-install but still does the same thing. Can you give me the exact directions in order to solve this problem please.

No worries, reach out to our team team in this case through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can work with you directly to figure out what's going on.  The HRT should have also offered some logs which you can attach for more context.  We'll see you there!
